name: Commune
description:
Unfortunately, my submission upload does not work at all. Oh well, life goes on.

However, if you would still like to experience my work, you will be able to play the Dev build here: Commune: The Version that Works

This version has no additional modifications after the Brackeys 2021.1 Deadline

This was a hard lesson for me, but I'm still eager to share my work. Please enjoy!

com-mune (v. kə-'myün) to talk together, usu. intensely and intimately; interchange thoughts or feelings

---

Stronger Together - Change the course of a community

Unite Them - Make obscure dialogue decisions that changes the attitudes of others.

Love Languages - Learn how each unique individual responds to your attention

Moods spread - Individuals talk to each other and influence others based on their current mood

---

A submission to Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam

(Please try windows file if HTML isn't running)
